details.title: Waveform Design for MIMO Radars
details.abstract: We consider the problem of waveform design for multiple input/multiple output (MIMO) radars, where the transmit waveforms are adjusted based on target and clutter statistics. A model for the radar returns which incorporates the transmit waveforms is developed. The target detection problem is formulated for that model. Optimal and suboptimal algorithms are derived for designing the transmit waveforms under different assumptions regarding the statistical information available to the detector. The performance of these algorithms is illustrated by computer simulation.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
